title: Bug 134040 - Row has page break property in Property Editor when it shouldn't
OB: Page break can be set to a row in the Property Editor but cannot be saved.
EB: Row should not have a page break property in the Property Editor. The expected behavior is that you should not be able to set a page break for a row in the Property Editor.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Insert a grid or table.
2. Select a row.
